actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to permit the delegation of certain powers and duties to private persons.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to permit the Federal Communications Commission to delegate to any qualified private person the examination, inspection, and testing necessary to the issuance of radio operators certificates as well as the actual issuance of such certificates. Permits the Commission to establish the maximum fees which such persons may charge for their services. States that the Commission may review any action taken by such person exercising delegated authority.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to permit the delegation of certain powers and duties to private persons.
